exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat ln : list nat lt : list (list bool * list bool) IHln : tile_concat ln lt = (itau1 lt (rev ln), itau2 lt (rev ln)) Unable to unify "(itau1 lt (rev ln) ++ itau1 lt [n], itau2 lt (rev ln) ++ itau2 lt [n])" with "let (th, tl) := nth n lt ([], []) in (itau1 lt (rev ln) ++ th, itau2 lt (rev ln) ++ tl)".

original: induction ln as [|n ln IHln]. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHln. rewrite itau1_app. rewrite itau2_app. reflexivity.
